Hey, I'm Jared. I mostly work on web related projects but every now and then I'll branch out and give something different a try.

I have experience with the tools that make up a modern web development tool chain, including but not limited to ES6, Typescript, NodeJS, VueJS, bundlers, and linters.

I also have knowledge with various different technologies such as PHP, Swift, Python, Lua, Java, MongoDB, Redis, MySQL, Postgres, and Linux.
